      • restoreReference

      • startInWriteAction

        public boolean startInWriteAction()
        Description copied from interface: IntentionAction
        Indicate whether this action should be invoked inside write action. Should return false if, e.g., a modal dialog is shown inside the action. If false is returned the action itself is responsible for starting write action when needed, by calling Application.runWriteAction(Runnable).
        Specified by:
        startInWriteAction in interface IntentionAction
        Specified by:
        startInWriteAction in interface WriteActionAware
        Returns:
        true if the intention requires a write action, false otherwise.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the name of the quick fix.

      • applyFix

        public void applyFix(Project project,
                     ProblemDescriptor descriptor)
        Description copied from interface: QuickFix
        Called to apply the fix.

        Please call com.intellij.profile.codeInspection.ProjectInspectionProfileManager#fireProfileChanged() if inspection profile is changed as result of fix.

        Specified by:
        applyFix in interface QuickFix<ProblemDescriptor>
        Parameters:
        project - Project
        descriptor - problem reported by the tool which provided this quick fix action
